data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.CompanySecretary
data.value: company secretary within an organisation partner

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.Director
data.value: company director within an organisation partner

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.IAgreeToBeAnApprovedPerson
data.value: I agree to be an approved person

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.IntroInstruction
data.value: You can continue to add the organisation without inviting someone to be an approved person. One must be appointed before you can

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.Introtext1
data.value: You are eligible to become an 'approved person' or you can invite somebody else to do this. An approved person needs to be invited to take on tasks on behalf of the organisation.

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.IntroText2
data.value: An approved person may delegate their function to another person (a delegate) at a later stage - subject to regulator approval.

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.IntroText3
data.value: More than one person can be invited - you will need to confirm their role, enter their name and contact details.

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.IWillInviteAnotherApprovedPerson
data.value: I will invite an eligible person to be an approved person

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.IWillInviteApprovedPersonLater
data.value: I will invite an approved person later

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.OptionError
data.value: Select whether to be an approved person, invite someone else to be one or do this later

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.RolesHeading
data.value: Roles eligible to be an approved person

data.name: LimitedPartnershipAddApprovedPerson.RolesInstruction
data.value: Any of these roles can be an approved person

data.name: LimitedLiablePartnershipAddApprovedPerson.RolesInstruction
data.value: Any member within a limited liability partnership can be an approved person.
